snippet: One of the more interesting effects you can do with a smartphone is night "light painting," where you take a long exposure image of a scene with your phone, and moving lights leave striking tracks of color in the final photograph.
abstract: One of the more interesting effects you can do with a smartphone is night "light painting," where you take a long exposure image of a scene with your phone, and moving lights leave striking tracks of color in the final photograph.

headline.main: App Smart Extra: Painting With Light
